testcase.classname: As a registered user (student/parent), I want to have access to the login page from the homepage
testcase.name: The Login button should be visible in the top bar of the homepage,
testcase.system-out: Given Given The user navigates to the "url"................................passed When on the homepage, the Login button should be visible and functional.....passed And the user clicks on the Login button.....................................passed Then the user should be redirected to the ""userlogin" page.................passed
